title: Transfer Talk: Will Pierre-Emerick Aubameyang be the catalyst for Arsenal?
description: The 10th episode of Transfer Talk is available to download now!
content: Host Pete Graves was joined in the studio by Sky Sports News reporters Dharmesh Sheth, Aidan Magee, Kaveh Solhekol and Spanish football expert Guillem Balague to chat about the latest moves in the transfer market.Click here to listen and subscribe via iTunes.Guillem joined the show to discuss Arsenal's club-record deal to sign Pierre-Emerick Aubameyang from Borussia Dortmund, while the panel debate what the future may hold for Manchester United forward Zlatan Ibrahimovic.The panel also discuss the transfer lines from a host of Premier League manager conferences, including Manchester City's last-ditch bid to sign Riyad Mahrez from Leicester.Click here to listen to the Transfer Talk podcast.If all that was not enough, Jim White and Hayley McQueen also joined the podcast to preview Deadline Day and answer all your questions!Get Sky Sports from Â£18 a month and watch the latest transfers live in action for their new teams
